mapper.select: select v.`no` vipNo,v.name vipName,v.phone kzPhone,r.phone,r.shareMoney,r.ygxfDate,r.qrcodeUrl,md.shopName,md.shopAddress,md.logo shopLogo from share_record r left join share_vip v on r.vipId=v.id left join `user` md on v.shopId=md.id where r.uuid=#{uuid}

(select r.uuid,v.name vipName,r.shareMoney,r.ygxfDate,md.shopName,md.logo shopLogo from share_record r left join share_vip v on r.vipId=v.id left join `user` md on v.shopId=md.id where r.fxzOpenId=#{fxzOpenId}) union (select r.uuid,v.name vipName,r.shareMoney,r.ygxfDate,md.shopName,md.logo shopLogo from share_history_record r,capital_flow_record c,share_vip v,`user` md where r.vipId=v.id and v.shopId=md.id and r.fxzOpenId=#{fxzOpenId} and c.srUuid=r.uuid) order by ygxfDate

select r.uuid,v.name vipName,r.shareMoney,r.ygxfDate,md.shopName,md.logo shopLogo from share_record r left join share_vip v on r.vipId=v.id left join capital_flow_record c on r.uuid=c.srUuid left join `user` md on v.shopId=md.id where c.state=${@com.cqgVipShare.entity.CapitalFlowRecord@DXF_STATE} and r.fxzOpenId=#{fxzOpenId} order by ygxfDate

select r.uuid,v.name vipName,r.shareMoney,r.ygxfDate,md.shopName,md.logo shopLogo from share_record r,capital_flow_record c,share_vip v,`user` md where r.vipId=v.id and v.shopId=md.id and r.fxzOpenId=#{fxzOpenId} and c.srUuid=r.uuid and c.state=${@com.cqgVipShare.entity.CapitalFlowRecord@YQX_STATE} order by ygxfDate
